# Set-up Environment 

```{bash}
git clone XXXX
conda env create -f env/nextflow.yaml
conda activate nextflow
```

# Define Input Files 

Edit the `nextflow.config` file to include the appropriate filepaths for the samples to be included in the pipeline, and the appropriate genome references.
